Pan Zhou

I am currently a first-year Ph.D. student in Learning and Vision Research Group at the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, National University of Singapore. My research areas are optimization, analysis of deep learning, compressed sensing.

Research

computer vision, multimedia and deep learning
